message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you still get a lot
Your turn Alice. How about a slight adjustment to make it fairer? This offer still leaves us both with a good amount.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Alice, time is running out.  This offer is a good compromise - let's settle this before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours, but I'm not going any lower
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you a very fair deal - almost an even split.  We're losing money with every passing round!
